page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = InsertColumn(Column as SQL::DataTypeInfo [, InsertBefore as N = 1])

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: Inicates whether the operation was successful.

argument.name: InsertBefore
argument.description: Optional. The column before which to insert the new column.

page.discussion: The InsertColumn() method inserts a new column into the column property before the column specified by InsertBefore. Note : Names must not duplicate ("" counts as a name).
page.example: dim ti as SQL::TableInfo dim co1 as SQL::DataTypeInfo dim co2 as SQL::DataTypeInfo co1.Name = "Customer" co1.AlphaType = "Character" col2.Name = "Product" col2.AlphaType = "Character" ? ti.AddColumn(co1) = 1 ? ti.InsertColumn(co2,1) = .T. ? ti.ColumnNumber("Customer") = 2
